de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.server

Interface IServerContexDemon


  • public interface IServerContexDemon
    Manipulation of the questions(documents) per filter definition. All questions run through the filter(s) defined in the project definition. The filters can modify the questions depending of the information in it. For example, the questions(documents,...) containing the text "support" are moved per definition to the subproject "support". The questions containing the text "order" are moved to the subproject "order". It happens per definition in the filter or per categorizing of the contex application that deliver the subproject name. The questions(documents) become the additional informations like tagmatches(Extraction module call).
    was:
    ServerContexDemon.java

          Question question,
          String doctype,
          HashMap<String,String> hm)
        The documents generated in a contex process are stored in the database. After the action the function is called.
        Parameters:
        con - current connection
        question - current question(document)
        doctype - document type
        hm - all types possible for the document
        Returns:
        true if the question(document) is stored, false otherwise
